name: New or Renamed User Account with '$' in Attribute 'SamAccountName'
description: Detects possible bypass EDR and SIEM via abnormal user account name.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND event.code:(4720 OR 4781) AND winlog.event_data.SamAccountName:*$*)`
